answers.answer: Congrats!  You should call your doctor about the swelling if you haven't already. You could have a blood clot.
Awwwww, congrats....hope that you get to feeling better soon.
Congratulations on the arrival of your son!! I have GD as well. When you had your final growth scan did they tell you he was that big (was their estimate correct)?
Congrats!! I agree w amarie0082 call that could be serious. I had a c section and never any sort of swelling..
Aww congrats. Love that he was born on Friday the 13th.

question: I went in for a scheduled c section on friday the 13th and had my little moose. My doctor was afraid my son was going to be really big, posing a risk of shoulder dystocia so we scheduled a c section. On june 13th at 951am, I gave birth to Anthony Nolan and he was 9lbs, 6ozs! Thank god I had the section lol. He had to stay in the nicu for 3 days because he couldn't regulate his blood sugar due to my gestational diabetes, but he got to come home yesterday.  Now I'm having swelling issues in my arms and legs and have a swollen vein in my right arm, but Ant is doing great!
title: my little man is here!
